courses.title: Guitar for Beginners
courses.description: Learn the basics of playing the guitar from chords to strumming patterns.

courses.title: Advanced Piano Techniques
courses.description: Master advanced techniques to enhance your piano playing.

courses.title: Vocal Training 101
courses.description: Develop your singing skills and learn proper vocal techniques.

courses.title: Music Theory Essentials
courses.description: Understand the foundation of music theory including scales and harmony.

courses.title: Jazz Improvisation
courses.description: Learn how to improvise over jazz progressions and develop your style.

courses.title: Drumming Basics
courses.description: Learn basic drumming techniques and rhythms to start your drumming journey.

courses.title: Songwriting Masterclass
courses.description: Master the art of songwriting and create songs that resonate.

courses.title: Electronic Music Production
courses.description: Produce your own electronic music using industry-standard tools.

courses.title: Ukulele for Beginners
courses.description: Start your musical journey with the ukulele, an easy and fun instrument.

courses.title: Classical Music Appreciation
courses.description: Explore the world of classical music and understand its rich history.
